original_text: At this time, you are saying, “Babylon's army will take power over our land. It will become like a desert. No people or animals will live in it.” But I tell you that one day people will again buy and sell fields in this land.
korean_text: 너희가 말하기를 황폐하여 사람이나 짐승이 없으며 갈대아인의 손에 넘긴 바 되었다 하는 이 땅에서 사람들이 밭을 사되

sentences.original_text: At this time, you are saying
Babylon's army will take power over our land
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌론 군대가 우리 땅을 지배할 것이다

sentences.original_text: It will become like a desert
No people or animals will live in it
sentences.korean_translation: 사람이나 짐승이 그곳에 살지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: that one day people will again buy and sell fields
sentences.korean_translation: 언젠가 사람들이 다시 밭을 사고 팔 것이다
